A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
You will like this film if you are under ten\, or drunk\, or a film critic on LSD\, or a film critic that has been bought and paid for by the Disney Corporation\, or anybody that has had a lobotomy.

The things I liked:

+Flying Lea reminded me of Casper the Friendly ghost\, and when I was a little kid I loved Casper\, so that brought back happy childhood memories.

+Looking forward to seeing how much flame gets thrown at this steaming pile when the Honest Trailer comes out.

+It did NOT  have Jar Jar\, Ewoks\, young Anikan or midichlorians in it.

The things I did not like:

-Story\, story structure\, character arcs\, plot\, and dialog. 

-Logic problems with everything.
